adc.c File Reference

This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of ADC. This also contains some related macros. More...

#include <stdint.h>

#include <ti/csl/hw_types.h>
#include <ti/csl/csl_adc.h>

Detailed Description

This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of ADC. This also contains some related macros.
